categories: Category:Stormtrooper officers of the Galactic Empire

nodes.text: Viq was a human stormtrooper who held the rank of sergeant in Darth Vader's First Legion during the reign of the Galactic Empire. The sergeant became involved in the conflict with the Grysks while serving with Commander Kimmund's unit. As such, Viq participated in the skirmish on Batuu and the Battle of Mokivj.
